name: Radical Rumble Beatdown 2007
description:
THIS SUNDAY, THE RADICAL RUMBLE BEATDOWN 2007 (UNRATED) IS TAKING PLACE IN OUR LOCAL GROCERY STORE, BE THERE, OR BE SQUARE... Square... square...

WATCH AS A SINGLE INTERN TAKES ON HUNDREDS OF THOUSANDS OF UNWILLING VOLUNTEERS WHO WERE PROMISED TO BE ON TV!

Choose from one of 36 characters who totally aren't just palette swaps, punch your way through hundreds of enemies who are showing no malicious intent, and charge your overloading ability to wipe out tons at a time! Pick up enemy's drops to keep your health up, and prepare every 10 waves for an extra chunky unpaid contestant to walk menacingly towards you, how long can you survive?

~ Info ~

Radical Rumble Beatdown was created in 72 hours as part of the Mini Jam 100! With the theme of "Overload" and a limitation requiring the game to be chaotic, I went through several ideas before landing on a totally off the rails boxing match, one vs many.

~ Instructions / Controls ~

WASD / Arrows - Move

Left Click - Punch

Right Click - Overload (When fully charged)
